sentence.Network_en: Wholesome and ordered international market competition need international antimonopoly law.
sentence.Network_cn: 健康、有序的国际市场竞争机制需要统一的国际反垄断法.

sentence.Network_en: It is contrary antimonopoly law , so Microsoft has superior in right time and right place.
sentence.Network_cn: 因此客观上讲,微软占有天时地利的优势.

sentence.Network_en: In general, It exists as the exemption from the application of antimonopoly law.
sentence.Network_cn: 一般是作为反垄断法的适用除外而存在的.

during the Bush administration , the Justice Department did not file a single case a dominant firm for violating the antimonopoly law .布什当政时期，司法部甚至没有处理过一起优势厂商违反反垄断法的案件。
